title: Little Girl Tells Her Teacher About Lots Of Weed At Her House, Dad Clears Up The Confusion
text:
Little Girl Tells Her Teacher About Lots Of Weed At Her House, Dad Clears Up The Confusion   
When this little girlâ€™s dad picked her up from school, he was surprised when her teacher informed him that she said they were growing weed at their house. Needing to get to the bottom of things, dad asked his little girl how the conversation went. 
After a short talk with her once they were home, dad realized that the confusion all came down to syntax. What she meant to say was that there are weeds growing in their backyard lawn!
